history.comment: Initial revision

description: A major Sumerian city-state founded during the Ubaid period, ca. 3800 B.C. In archaeological terms, Ur is particularly well known for the lavish tombs of its Royal Cemetery, its massive Ziggurat. The site served as the capital of the Ur III dynasty.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Tell Muqayyar IRQ
